title: Ticket #5514: Add IP_ADDRESSES macro.
description:
It may be useful for debugging (both automatic testing and 'condor_config_val -dump IP_ADDRESSES') to have a macro which expands to the comma-separated (so that CHOICE() works) list of IP addresses that HTCondor detected on the machine.

We may need to tweak that definition in the future, but it should be enough to get started.
creator: tlmiller
